605480.name: Fantasy Grounds - Daring Tales of Adventure 04: The Talons of LoPeng (Savage Worlds)
605480.description:
Daring Tales of Adventure #04: The Talons of Lo-Peng
A Fantasy Grounds II Adventure module from Triple Ace Games
In 1935 the heroes uncovered part of an ancient Chinese artefact in the mountains
of Tibet, an artefact sought by a Chinese mystic by the name of Lo-Peng.
A year later in someone has stolen the relic from Boston Museum. A strange Chinese
pictogram left at the crime scene leads the adventurers on rollercoaster ride from
Boston to Afghanistan, onto Venice, and finally to China and the tomb of the first
Emperor.
Martial artists, ancient Chinese warriors with supernatural powers, deadly traps,
and fierce Afghan tribesmen stand between the heroes and victory. Can the heroes
escape the Talons of Lo-Peng?
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual
tabletop. The adventure module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay
and includes, story elements, personalities, items, vehicles and images. These can
be modified within your Fantasy Grounds campaign as needed. The Savage Worlds ruleset
and a Full license of Fantasy Grounds II are required to use this product.
Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Clemens Meyer
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Clemens Meyer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
